ingredients.content: 400 g tinned kidney beans, drained and rinsed
15 g dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids), small pieces or callets

preparations.content: Place garlic, onions and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>8 min/120°C//speed <b>.

Add tomatoes, tomato purée, sugar, salt, bay leaf, turmeric, paprika, oregano, cumin, ground cloves and cayenne. Insert simmering basket and weigh in beans then cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed <b>. Meanwhile, preheat oven to 180°C. Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula.
Add dark chocolate and heat <b>3 min/100°C//speed <b>. Meanwhile, warm tacos on a baking tray in oven for 3 minutes (180°C).
Transfer chilli to a large bowl and stir in warm kidney beans. Fill tacos with chilli then sprinkle with grated cheese and coriander. Serve accompanied with sour cream and lime.
